name: Medieval Murderer
description:
After a very stressful week working in the fields, you found yourself being ripped off by a cheap villager. After asking around you all you could find out was the job that this person held in a village nearby. Looks like you found your next victim...

Play as a psychopathic murderer who chooses his targets based on small wrongdoings, you have arrived at this small village looking for your next victim. Look around the village, find clues about where your target could be, talk to the villagers and take that life!

This game was created as a project for my university to show off 3D models, textures and sound assets created by me over a period of a few weeks.

Note: As this project was created mainly to show off assets, it does not run well. It is also very big, as the files and project itself have not been optimised.
